item.description:
The Beginning Anew ceremony and practice is a powerful and intensely moving experience. It allows the participants to look deeply within, to share their feelings about others or events, and to let go of the obstacles to peace and harmony. There will be 4 main phases: 1) mindful incense offering, 2) sharing regrets, 3) expressing hurt, 4) sharing a difficulty & asking for support. Sharing is purely voluntary but listening is a powerful experience. After each phase, a short meditation and loving kindness will be given the participants. Presented by Senpai.

This is also our first Sunday morning Gathering for 2010. Welcome back from our Winter recess.

Visit our main web site for Calendar and other details on our community.
